channel.title: Posts on Dennis Traub

item.title: Monday, 28th October 2024
item.description: I’m testing JetBrains Fleet today. It feels a bit odd because I’m used to fully featured IDEs like IntelliJ IDEA, etc. Not sure if I like it yet, but I’ll give it a try for a few days and we’ll see if it can be a lightweight alternative, at least for simple editing, like writing this blog.
